files.description: Documentation describing how to run the validation harness, what artifacts it expects under /outputs, and common failure modes and fixes.

missionDescription: Create a single entrypoint script/command (e.g., scripts/run_validation_harness.sh) that: (1) runs the scaffold generator, (2) checks for required files under /outputs (e.g., REPORT_OUTLINE.md, templates, pilot case), and (3) runs validators; fail with clear error messages when artifacts are missing.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes a minimal, automated end-to-end validation harness that proves the scaffold produces expected deliverables; this directly combats the 'audit shows 0 files' problem by making missing output...
